'''1.16.61''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for PlayStation 4 on September 25, 2020, which fixes bugs and crashes.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360050155151|title=Minecraft - 1.16.61 (PS4 Only)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=September 25, 2020}}</ref>

==Fixes==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.16.60 (PS4)|otherissuescount=1
|63884|If a player tries to connect to a PS4 world from anything but a PS4, the game crashes.
|100881|Minecraft refusing to launch after PSVR update.
}}
* Fixed an issue where launching PS VR with Supersampling enabled caused crashes in VR Mode
